_source.content: 100 Percent Fed Up reports ‚Äì Newly acquired public records reveal that there‚Äôs much more to the exact relationship between the Electronic Registration Information Center (ERIC) and the Center for Election Innovation and Research (CEIR) than meets the eye.Emails obtained by the Public Interest Legal Foundation (and archived here) show Rhode Island Elections Director Rob Rock ‚Äúworking with CEIR‚Äù ‚Äúto facilitate the secure transfer of . . . ERIC member data‚Äù to this private, third-party organization run by ERIC founder and ex-board member David Becker.On January 12, 2021, Rock sought clarification from ERIC executive director Shane Hamlin on sharing data with CEIR in an email titled ‚ÄúEBU Follow-Up Data Request.‚Äù (‚ÄúEBU‚Äù refers to eligible-but-unregistered individuals or residents who lawfully may but have not yet registered to vote.)Later that day, Hamlin replied: ‚ÄúYes, you‚Äôre good to continue working with CEIR. CEIR signed an NDA [non-disclosure agreement] with ERIC for the purpose of assisting ERIC and ERIC members with independent research ERIC‚Äôs effectiveness.‚Äù (It‚Äôs unclear when this agreement was signed, and whether ERIC has similar agreements with other third parties.)‚ÄúThis should be the same process you used to provide the EBU list to CEIR,‚Äù Hamlin added. From Rock‚Äôs reply, it‚Äôs likely that transfers of EBU data follow the usual 60-day data transfer requirements outlined in the group‚Äôs bylaws, in which states send all of their voter list information to the data warehouse.https://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2023/03/bombshell-emails-show-eric-systems-were-sharing-voter-information-with-third-party-group-tied-to-zuckerberg-in-2020-election/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=the-gateway-pundit&utm_campaign=dailyam&utm_content=2023-03-23
_source.contentraw:
100 Percent Fed Up reports ‚Äì Newly acquired public records reveal that there‚Äôs much more to the exact relationship between the Electronic Registration Information Center (ERIC) and the Center for Election Innovation and Research (CEIR) than meets the eye.
Emails obtained by the Public Interest Legal Foundation (and archived here) show Rhode Island Elections Director Rob Rock ‚Äúworking with CEIR‚Äù ‚Äúto facilitate the secure transfer of . . . ERIC member data‚Äù to this private, third-party organization run by ERIC founder and ex-board member David Becker.

On January 12, 2021, Rock sought clarification from ERIC executive director Shane Hamlin on sharing data with CEIR in an email titled ‚ÄúEBU Follow-Up Data Request.‚Äù (‚ÄúEBU‚Äù refers to eligible-but-unregistered individuals or residents who lawfully may but have not yet registered to vote.)

Later that day, Hamlin replied: ‚ÄúYes, you‚Äôre good to continue working with CEIR. CEIR signed an NDA [non-disclosure agreement] with ERIC for the purpose of assisting ERIC and ERIC members with independent research ERIC‚Äôs effectiveness.‚Äù (It‚Äôs unclear when this agreement was signed, and whether ERIC has similar agreements with other third parties.)

‚ÄúThis should be the same process you used to provide the EBU list to CEIR,‚Äù Hamlin added. From Rock‚Äôs reply, it‚Äôs likely that transfers of EBU data follow the usual 60-day data transfer requirements outlined in the group‚Äôs bylaws, in which states send all of their voter list information to the data warehouse.

https://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2023/03/bombshell-emails-show-eric-systems-were-sharing-voter-information-with-third-party-group-tied-to-zuckerberg-in-2020-election/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=the-gateway-pundit&utm_campaign=dailyam&utm_content=2023-03-23

card.description: Patriots Against Corrupt Election Results - PACER Keeps you on top of new developments, rhetoric, and activism regarding voter fraud and election integrity issues
card.title: Commentary

_source.content: 3/23/23 The Rise and Fall of ERIChttp://www.liberato.us/commentary.htmlRecent news shows it‚Äôs possible to undo the Democrats‚Äô weaponization of our elections apparatus.  Florida, Missouri, and West Virginia joined Louisiana and Alabama in leaving ERIC, the voter registration data clearinghouse conservatives say is really a get-out-the-vote drive for Democrats.  ERIC is the Electronic Registration Information Center, initially funded with George Soros money [more documentation here] and, until recently, overseen by a high-profile Democrat election lawyer.  ERIC is supposed to help member states scrub their voter rolls of deceased and moved-away voters, but one of the complaints is that ERIC does a bad job, leaving the rolls bloated and elections vulnerable to fraud as a result.  Ohio and Iowa are the latest states to leave ERIC.  Alaska and Texas may follow.  States are leaving for many reasons.  One of the reasons Louisiana gave was the overall Democrat tilt to the entire operation.  Alabama was worried about a private group having access to voter data, among other things.  Ohio had asked for changes and left when none were forthcoming.  At this point, ERIC only serves the interests of the Democrats, Ohio‚Äôs Secretary of State said in a letter. These are not the only problems with ERIC.  It recently came to light ERIC has been sharing data with a left-wing nonprofit - the Center for Election Innovation and Research (CEIR) - run by the very same high-profile Democrat election lawyer mentioned earlier (David Becker) who founded and only recently departed ERIC.  The data pinpointed likely Democrat voters who had not yet registered to vote so they could be targeted for partisan registration drives.  As if illicit data sharing were not enough, ERIC also restricts states from acting against noncitizens registered to vote and tells states to keep their list maintenance data secret even though federal law requires it be made public.  Other critics point out states are legally obligated to maintain their voter rolls and nothing in law allows them to outsource that function to outside private third parties, to begin with.  In addition, according to an election integrity activist in my network, ERIC also requires member states to move to "online only" voter registration to eliminate signed voter registration documents.  This completely frustrates signature verification requirements between registration documents and mail-in ballots in those states that require such verification.  Still other critics reinforce the perception, stated at the outset, that ERIC is far more effective at identifying potential voters for the Democrats than keeping the voter rolls up to date.  States are scrambling for alternatives.  Texas is developing an interstate crosscheck system to eliminate duplicate registrations.  There used to be such a system, but the left-wing ACLU sued it out of existence, clearing the field for ERIC.  Activists in Maryland point to one piece of the puzzle, a free service from the Post Office that standardizes addresses and tells you whether mail is deliverable there.  Then there is the Omega4America operation that hopes to be in 15 or 20 states in 2024.  It checks voter rolls against publicly available information to sniff out problem addresses in the records like hotels, RV parks, and prisons where felons are not supposed to vote.  It can also ferret out fraud by elections officials if, for example, they change inactive voters to active status in the records wholesale, mail them ballots that get intercepted, then change the records back to inactive status.  ERIC is just one way the Democrats have weaponized elections.  I‚Äôll show you more when I return to the subject of election integrity next week.

group.description: WARNING - this group may cause original thoughts to develop and have you questioning your programmed and indoctrinated thinking. We were fed a well-packaged web of lies, gradually over several generations. While to young to think for ourselves, they brainwashed us with false beliefs. They seek to destroy our faith in the Great Architect, our Creator. Science expects you deny your lying eyes and worship they're Graven Image, the Globe. Science claims we evolved from pond scum, crawled out of the sea and grew legs. Every ancient culture has always depicted Earth as Level and Stationary as described in scripture. Nobody believed that spinning globe until gov't education. Let's examine the evidence . . Every ocean measures perfectly Flat, no curvature has ever been measured. We've shot lasers and zoomed our cameras over impossible distances, globe geometry completely fails. No instrument known to man, has ever detected any motion of Earth. The mechanical gyroscope proves Earth does not move. During winter, darkness would face 180¬∞ opposite than summer. We could not possibly see all the same stars from opposite sides of the sun. Every star seen from Earth, can be seen every night of the year. Not one star ever leaves the view from Earth, how could that be true if Earth orbited the Sun ? Some may ask to see an edge, why must there be an edge ? Antarctica is not a southern continent, it's an encircling ice wall that forms a barrier. "Antarctic Treaty" prohibits all private research. Why do they hide Antarctica from us ? Purpose for this group is to present the REAL evidence supporting  and validating the Flat Earth. With extensive and undeniable Evidence, clearly and easily defining the true nature of our Earth. We're at a time, where if you know the truth and do not speak it, you're no better than those who deceive us. group.description_html: WARNING - this group may cause original thoughts to develop and have you questioning your programmed and indoctrinated thinking. We were fed a well-packaged web of lies, gradually over several generations. While to young to think for ourselves, they brainwashed us with false beliefs. They seek to destroy our faith in the Great Architect, our Creator. Science expects you deny your lying eyes and worship they're Graven Image, the Globe. Science claims we evolved from pond scum, crawled out of the sea and grew legs. Every ancient culture has always depicted Earth as Level and Stationary as described in scripture. Nobody believed that spinning globe until gov't education. Let's examine the evidence . . Every ocean measures perfectly Flat, no curvature has ever been measured. We've shot lasers and zoomed our cameras over impossible distances, globe geometry completely fails. No instrument known to man, has ever detected any motion of Earth. The mechanical gyroscope proves Earth does not move. During winter, darkness would face 180¬∞ opposite than summer. We could not possibly see all the same stars from opposite sides of the sun. Every star seen from Earth, can be seen every night of the year. Not one star ever leaves the view from Earth, how could that be true if Earth orbited the Sun ? Some may ask to see an edge, why must there be an edge ? Antarctica is not a southern continent, it's an encircling ice wall that forms a barrier. "Antarctic Treaty" prohibits all private research. Why do they hide Antarctica from us ? Purpose for this group is to present the REAL evidence supporting and validating the Flat Earth. With extensive and undeniable Evidence, clearly and easily defining the true nature of our Earth. We're at a time, where if you know the truth and do not speak it, you're no better than those who deceive us. _source.content: Then Vice-President Joe Biden‚Äôs Communications Director Kate Bedingfield reassured Hunter ‚ÄúCrack Head‚Äù Biden‚Äôs top lieutenant in 2015 that a damaging story from Bloomberg reporter Margaret Talev about the family‚Äôs business dealings in Ukraine would be quashed unless ‚Äúeditors hold a gun to her head,‚Äù emails obtained from the National Archives show.The emails are just one more record revealing a close working relationship between Joe Biden‚Äôs White House team and the family‚Äôs business, via partner Eric Schwerin, who is apparently cooperating with House investigators.Absolutely ‚Äî we have had two conversations about it ‚Äî she will only use if her editors put a gun to her head. _source.contentraw:
Then Vice-President Joe Biden‚Äôs Communications Director Kate Bedingfield reassured Hunter ‚ÄúCrack Head‚Äù Biden‚Äôs top lieutenant in 2015 that a damaging story from Bloomberg reporter Margaret Talev about the family‚Äôs business dealings in Ukraine would be quashed unless ‚Äúeditors hold a gun to her head,‚Äù emails obtained from the National Archives show.

The emails are just one more record revealing a close working relationship between Joe Biden‚Äôs White House team and the family‚Äôs business, via partner Eric Schwerin, who is apparently cooperating with House investigators.

Absolutely ‚Äî we have had two conversations about it ‚Äî she will only use if her editors put a gun to her head. She absolutely will not do the second thing,‚Äù Bedingfield replied to Schwerin about a potential Bloomberg story about Hunter‚Äôs role at Burisma, and another about his discharge from the Navy.

Despite Bedingfield‚Äôs efforts to prevent the story from being published, it appears Bloomberg did publish the story on December 8, the same day as the communication.

card.title: Harbor Freight Tools For Schools Prize for Teaching Excellence

_source.content: http://hftforschoolsprize.orgHarbor Freight Toolshttp://harborfreight.com$1.5 Million for High School Skilled Trades Teachers and ProgramsEric Smidt, Harbor Freight Tools for Schools Founder Thu, Mar 23 at 9:43 AMView OnlineHARBOR FREIGHT Tools for Schools LogoWe know that high school skilled trades teachers play a vital role in preparing our country‚Äôs future skilled trades workforce. Their classes open doors to great careers and meaningful work. That‚Äôs why Harbor Freight Tools for Schools has awarded over $6 million over the last 6 years to more than 100 U.S. public high school teachers and their programs. Thousands of students benefitted as a result.The Harbor Freight Tools for Schools Prize for Teaching Excellence¬Æ has brought much-deserved attention and support to these incredible teachers, students, and skilled trades programs. The prize started as an experiment in 2017, awarding a total of $500,000 to 12 skilled trades teachers and their programs. With so many qualified candidates applying, over the last few years, we more than doubled the annual award amount to $1,250,000.Over the next decade, the U.S. will be making the largest investment ever in roadways, bridges, ports, and other infrastructure. We also need to make an unprecedented investment in the next generation of tradespeople who will do this important work. So this year, we‚Äôve decided to increase the prize again and will award $1.5 million to 25 outstanding public high school skilled trades teachers and their programs across the country.In the video below, students and a past prizewinning teacher share the impact of winning the prize and why outstanding skilled trades teachers should apply.videoIf you know an excellent public high school skilled trades teacher in your community, please encourage them to apply for the 2023 prize at http://hftforschoolsprize.org. Applications are open now through May 5, 2023.Thank you for helping share our respect and admiration for these incredible teachers!Sincerely,Eric SmidtFounder, Harbor Freight Tools for Schools, LLCOwner and Founder, Harbor Freight ToolsHarbor Freight Tools for Schools is a program of The Smidt Foundation, established by Harbor Freight Tools owner and founder Eric Smidt, to advance excellent skilled trades education in U.S. public high schools. With a deep respect for the dignity of these fields and for the intelligence and creativity of people who work with their hands, Harbor Freight Tools for Schools aims to drive a greater understanding of and investment in skilled trades education, believing that access to quality skilled trades education gives high school students pathways to graduation, opportunity, good jobs, and a workforce our country needs. Harbor Freight Tools is a major supporter of the Harbor Freight Tools for Schools program. For more information, visit: http://harborfreighttoolsforschools.org###Apply at http://hftforschoolsprize.org. Stay up to date on the latest Prize news on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter
_source.contentraw:
http://hftforschoolsprize.org
Harbor Freight Tools
http://harborfreight.com

$1.5 Million for High School Skilled Trades Teachers and Programs


Eric Smidt, Harbor Freight Tools for Schools Founder


Thu, Mar 23 at 9:43 AM

View Online
HARBOR FREIGHT Tools for Schools Logo
We know that high school skilled trades teachers play a vital role in preparing our country‚Äôs future skilled trades workforce. Their classes open doors to great careers and meaningful work. That‚Äôs why Harbor Freight Tools for Schools has awarded over $6 million over the last 6 years to more than 100 U.S. public high school teachers and their programs. Thousands of students benefitted as a result.

The Harbor Freight Tools for Schools Prize for Teaching Excellence¬Æ has brought much-deserved attention and support to these incredible teachers, students, and skilled trades programs. The prize started as an experiment in 2017, awarding a total of $500,000 to 12 skilled trades teachers and their programs. With so many qualified candidates applying, over the last few years, we more than doubled the annual award amount to $1,250,000.

Over the next decade, the U.S. will be making the largest investment ever in roadways, bridges, ports, and other infrastructure. We also need to make an unprecedented investment in the next generation of tradespeople who will do this important work. So this year, we‚Äôve decided to increase the prize again and will award $1.5 million to 25 outstanding public high school skilled trades teachers and their programs across the country.

In the video below, students and a past prizewinning teacher share the impact of winning the prize and why outstanding skilled trades teachers should apply.

video
If you know an excellent public high school skilled trades teacher in your community, please encourage them to apply for the 2023 prize at http://hftforschoolsprize.org. Applications are open now through May 5, 2023.

Thank you for helping share our respect and admiration for these incredible teachers!

Sincerely,

Eric Smidt
Founder, Harbor Freight Tools for Schools, LLC
Owner and Founder, Harbor Freight Tools

Harbor Freight Tools for Schools is a program of The Smidt Foundation, established by Harbor Freight Tools owner and founder Eric Smidt, to advance excellent skilled trades education in U.S. public high schools. With a deep respect for the dignity of these fields and for the intelligence and creativity of people who work with their hands, Harbor Freight Tools for Schools aims to drive a greater understanding of and investment in skilled trades education, believing that access to quality skilled trades education gives high school students pathways to graduation, opportunity, good jobs, and a workforce our country needs. Harbor Freight Tools is a major supporter of the Harbor Freight Tools for Schools program. For more information, visit: http://harborfreighttoolsforschools.org
###

Apply at http://hftforschoolsprize.org. Stay up to date on the latest Prize news on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter

_source.content: This took place on Tues. night where my son preaches. God moves, restores, reclaims and still saves by the power of the Holy Spirit! Praise Him!"One of the brothers in the Life Recovery program came up to the table and we started talking. As that conversation unfolded it became clear that the Holy Spirit had a deep and meaningful word for my friend.Right there in a room full of hustle and bustle, the Lord extended His hand of love and concern and ministered encouragement and as tears flowed, grace flowed.I opened my eyes as I pulled back my hand that had been touching his arm and there was a sweet glory of God‚Äôs loving presence surrounding us and it left us both kinda stunned in a sacred moment of God‚Äôs in-rushing power.‚Äú‚Ä¶the Spirit of the LORD rushed upon David‚Ä¶‚Äù -1 Samuel 16:13The chapel service unfolded in like manner from the worship to the last prayer prayed over men.I watched the Lord sound forth His word in life penetrating power as I preached from the parable of the 10 Virgins.The hammer fell, sparks and fire illuminated minds and hearts and the battle for the throne of men‚Äôs lives was under assault.The Spirit rose up and brought the dragon under His foot in that place, and as the trumpet sounded the call for the conquered to surrender at the altar resulted in men slowly yielding until all the prayer warriors that came to fight with me upfront, were ministering the life and light of Christ to all who came forward.Men brought their gratitude, joy, brokenness, anguish, grief, desperation, heavy burdens, dreams and visions and prophetic words, prayers for healing flowed in a tide of mercy poured out in encouragement, counsel, hugs and tears.I was exhausted, but reveled in the triumph of God‚Äôs truth and love displayed that night.This song captures the glory of His goodness that night and I pray that all that read this testimony will experience the same power found in His word and Spirit.‚ÄúAnd I will prophecyThat hearts and mindsWill fully be restoredI'll reclaim all that wasLost so hell can't have it anymoreAnd what was once closed offIs now revealed to be an open doorAnd I believe with YouThe after's always better than before‚ÄùPastor Eric Blauer.
_source.contentraw:
This took place on Tues. night where my son preaches.

God moves, restores, reclaims and still saves by the power of the Holy Spirit! Praise Him!

"One of the brothers in the Life Recovery program came up to the table and we started talking. As that conversation unfolded it became clear that the Holy Spirit had a deep and meaningful word for my friend.

Right there in a room full of hustle and bustle, the Lord extended His hand of love and concern and ministered encouragement and as tears flowed, grace flowed.

I opened my eyes as I pulled back my hand that had been touching his arm and there was a sweet glory of God‚Äôs loving presence surrounding us and it left us both kinda stunned in a sacred moment of God‚Äôs in-rushing power.

‚Äú‚Ä¶the Spirit of the LORD rushed upon David‚Ä¶‚Äù -1 Samuel 16:13

The chapel service unfolded in like manner from the worship to the last prayer prayed over men.

I watched the Lord sound forth His word in life penetrating power as I preached from the parable of the 10 Virgins.

The hammer fell, sparks and fire illuminated minds and hearts and the battle for the throne of men‚Äôs lives was under assault.

The Spirit rose up and brought the dragon under His foot in that place, and as the trumpet sounded the call for the conquered to surrender at the altar resulted in men slowly yielding until all the prayer warriors that came to fight with me upfront, were ministering the life and light of Christ to all who came forward.

Men brought their gratitude, joy, brokenness, anguish, grief, desperation, heavy burdens, dreams and visions and prophetic words, prayers for healing flowed in a tide of mercy poured out in encouragement, counsel, hugs and tears.

I was exhausted, but reveled in the triumph of God‚Äôs truth and love displayed that night.

This song captures the glory of His goodness that night and I pray that all that read this testimony will experience the same power found in His word and Spirit.

‚ÄúAnd I will prophecy
That hearts and minds
Will fully be restored
I'll reclaim all that was
Lost so hell can't have it anymore
And what was once closed off
Is now revealed to be an open door
And I believe with You
The after's always better than before‚Äù

Pastor Eric Blauer.

group.description:
This moderated group is for born-again believers, centered on Christ and the Bible to minister in the following ways:
-present the gospel
-make disciples.
-serve the needs of brothers and sisters in Christ by the Spirit.

This group is for sharing and caring in Christ. It is not for current events, prophetic speculation, philosophy, politics, secular interests, religiosity,  advertisements or promotions.

Posts contrary to the above stated 3 missions may be removed at the discretion of the moderators. Likewise, if anyone continues contrary to solid biblical doctrine or continues publishing off-topic or provokes division, that person may be removed from the group at the discretion of the moderators.
This group is in the tradition of under shepherds such as Wycliffe, Zwingli, Tyndale, Spurgeon, D.L. Moody, Warren W. Wiersbe, J, Vernon McGee,  John MacArthur (to name a few & give a clue).
  
IMPORTANT: To join and participate in this group, read, and understand the statements, policies & publishing guidelines found here:
https://gab.com/IConG/posts/107333817771716935

We agree with the statement of faith found here:
https://www.gotquestions.org/faith.html

group.description:
Brothers and Sisters in Christ, I‚Äôm @Shooglenifty. God is good and His mercy endures forever!***By posting you are agreeing to our posting standards. We will remove a post according to our interpretation (written by us) of the guidelines below. If there is any confusion, please DM.***My hopes for the group is to foster phileo between the Christian diaspora that has chosen to join this group. We want to be a place where unbelievers come for answers and believers come to be bolstered in their faith. By the grace of God through the blood of Jesus we will bring His love to multitudes. My reasoning? I believe this: "Never doubt God‚Äôs mighty power to work in you and accomplish all this. He will achieve infinitely more than your greatest request, your most unbelievable dream, and exceed your wildest imagination! He will outdo them all, for his miraculous power constantly energizes you.‚Äù Ephesians 3:20 TPT

***PLEASE READ BEFORE POSTING: Posts that are encouraged (think ENGAGEMENT! and WHAT IS GOD TELLING YOU!):

1. Testimonies, praise reports, prayer requests, encouragements, prophecies, words from God, exhortations, etc.

2. Questions of those looking to our community for answers that only God can give.

3. Sermons, articles, videos, pictures and verses as long as they have a good description outlining who, what, where, why and how. If you don't respect the link you are posting or the other Christians in the group enough to take some time with your post, please don't post it. 

***It seems most just post and run (seagull posting) and this is not God's heart nor mine. This group has ONE timeline. It also has many members. Is it respectful on your part to post several one-line posts in a row pushing someone else's well-thought post or plea out of sight of the group? 

With that in mind the following types of posts will be removed at the sole discretion of the moderators:
1. Off-topic posts: politics, flat earth, begging for followers or money (please reach out to the admin if you believe you have a worthy fundraising cause. You will be required to provide proof and cause. Any fundraiser posted without prior discussion will be removed), promoting personal agendas, etc.

2. Intentionally divisive, argumentative, disrespectful or racist posts.

3. Low effort (Just posting a video/link is not sufficient within the group, you must also write YOUR OWN description of the link/video; the included video/link description is not acceptable) or multiple posts in a row (limit of 2 posts per 3 hours)

4. Posts that don't meet the criteria mentioned above

5. Any reposts from other groups that are unrelated to Christianity; reposts of posts already in the group timeline (if you agree with a post just say it in the original post); and any reposts of your disagreements within a post brought to the group timeline.

6. Anyone who spams the same post to multiple groups (yes, I check timelines), or continually posts the same post/s in the timeline. 

7. All members who block the administrators and moderators will be removed.

***Remember that we are the body of Christ. Please keep your posts in line with Philippians 4:8 (ESV): Finally, brothers, whatever is true, whatever is honorable, whatever is just, whatever is pure, whatever is lovely, whatever is commendable, if there is any excellence, if there is anything worthy of praise, think (post!) about these things.

***‚ÄúThe Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face to shine upon you and be gracious to you; the Lord lift up his countenance upon you and give you peace. ‚ÄúSo shall they put my name upon the people of Israel, and I will bless them.‚Äù Numbers 6:24-27 ESV

***Group Creator:  @Micaiah
Admins/Mods: @Shooglenifty, @riustan

_source.contentraw:
This took place on Tues. night where my son preaches.

God moves, restores, reclaims and still saves by the power of the Holy Spirit! Praise Him!

"One of the brothers in the Life Recovery program came up to the table and we started talking. As that conversation unfolded it became clear that the Holy Spirit had a deep and meaningful word for my friend.

Right there in a room full of hustle and bustle, the Lord extended His hand of love and concern and ministered encouragement and as tears flowed, grace flowed.

I opened my eyes as I pulled back my hand that had been touching his arm and there was a sweet glory of God‚Äôs loving presence surrounding us and it left us both kinda stunned in a sacred moment of God‚Äôs in-rushing power.

‚Äú‚Ä¶the Spirit of the LORD rushed upon David‚Ä¶‚Äù -1 Samuel 16:13

The chapel service unfolded in like manner from the worship to the last prayer prayed over men.

I watched the Lord sound forth His word in life penetrating power as I preached from the parable of the 10 Virgins.

The hammer fell, sparks and fire illuminated minds and hearts and the battle for the throne of men‚Äôs lives was under assault.

The Spirit rose up and brought the dragon under His foot in that place, and as the trumpet sounded the call for the conquered to surrender at the altar resulted in men slowly yielding until all the prayer warriors that came to fight with me upfront, were ministering the life and light of Christ to all who came forward.

Men brought their gratitude, joy, brokenness, anguish, grief, desperation, heavy burdens, dreams and visions and prophetic words, prayers for healing flowed in a tide of mercy poured out in encouragement, counsel, hugs and tears.

I was exhausted, but reveled in the triumph of God‚Äôs truth and love displayed that night.

This song captures the glory of His goodness that night and I pray that all that read this testimony will experience the same power found in His word and Spirit.

‚ÄúAnd I will prophecy
That hearts and minds
Will fully be restored
I'll reclaim all that was
Lost so hell can't have it anymore
And what was once closed off
Is now revealed to be an open door
And I believe with You
The after's always better than before‚Äù

Pastor Eric Blauer.

_source.content: Yo "Democrat Sheep". Check Dis Out.Then-Vice President Joe Biden approved an official statement in December 2015 about Hunter Biden‚Äôs position on a Ukrainian energy company‚Äôs board despite claims he was not involved with the family‚Äôs business, emails obtained from the National Archives show.Since assuming office, at least seven times Joe Biden or his communications team have outright denied, and deflected questions about, involvement in the Biden family enterprise.Biden ‚Äúacted at all times in a manner consistent with well-established executive branch ethics standards,‚Äù Andrew Bates, a spokesman for the president‚Äôs campaign, said in 2019. ‚ÄúHe carried out the Obama-Biden administration‚Äôs policies without regard to any interests other than the public‚Äôs and neither discussed this with his son nor was involved in any way with his son‚Äôs private business pursuits.‚ÄùBut those denials have been proven false again by a new trove of emails uncovered from the National Archives by America First Legal. The new trove of emails unearthed by a lawsuit against the Archives shows Biden and Hunter coordinated through their respective associates in response to questions from reporters about if Hunter‚Äôs position on Burisma‚Äôs board undermined then-Vice President Biden‚Äôs credibility in pushing anti-corruption measures.In April 2014, Hunter joined the board of Burisma, just two years before Joe Biden stated he forced the firing of Ukraine prosecutor Viktor Shokin, who was investigating Burisma. Despite Hunter‚Äôs lack of experience in Ukraine or the energy sector, he was paid $83,000 per month by the energy company, or $1 million per year ‚Äî just weeks after his father was announced ‚Äúpoint person‚Äù on U.S. foreign policy toward Ukraine.Emails previously released from the Archives show Hunter advised the Office of Vice President Biden in 2014 on how to handle media inquiries regarding his position on the board of Burisma, a potential violation of federal law due to Hunter failing to register as a foreign agent.That trend appears to have continued well into 2015 when Kate Bedingfield, Biden‚Äôs former communications director, told Hunter‚Äôs top financial lieutenant Eric Schwerin via email that Joe Biden approved a statement regarding Hunter‚Äôs board position.Notably, Bedingfield departed the White House in 2023 just as the House Oversight Committee probe into Joe Biden heated up.‚ÄúVP signed off on this ‚Äî will give this quote to reporters in my name shortly,‚Äù she said, including the quote below in the email:‚ÄúHunter Biden is a private citizen and a lawyer. The Vice President does not endorse any particular company and has no involvement with this company. The Vice President has pushed aggressively for years ‚Äî both publicly with groups like the US-Ukraine Business Forum and privately in meetings in with [sic] Ukrainian leaders ‚Äî for Ukraine to make every effort to investigate and prosecute corruption in accordance with the rule of law. It will once again be a key focus during his trip this week.‚ÄùAmerica First Legal President Stephen Miller stated the emails are a bombshell that shows Hunter and Joe Biden often coordinated about the family‚Äôs business dealings. They are ‚Äúexplosive revelations‚Äù that ‚Äúconclusively demonstrate that there is no daylight between Hunter and Joe Biden on Ukraine,‚Äù he said in a statement.‚ÄúTaken together with the Oversight Committee‚Äôs revelations about the Biden Family finances, it is now indisputable that there is a need for a full criminal investigation into the Bidens‚Äô foreign influence peddling and exotic foreign financial payoffs,‚Äù Miller said.On Thursday, the House Oversight Committee revealed a Biden family business associate received a $3 million wire transfer from a Chinese energy company and subsequent payments after Joe Biden left the vice presidency in 2017. In turn, the family business associate sent $1.3 million to Hunter, James, Hallie, and an unknown ‚ÄúBiden.‚ÄùJoe Biden denied the payout on Friday when questioned about recent revelations the family received funds from China.Can you say Influence Peddling, Pay to Play Scams, Money Laundering, Tax Evasion etc.Say it ain't So..........."Quid Pro Joe"
_source.contentraw:
Yo "Democrat Sheep". Check Dis Out.

Then-Vice President Joe Biden approved an official statement in December 2015 about Hunter Biden‚Äôs position on a Ukrainian energy company‚Äôs board despite claims he was not involved with the family‚Äôs business, emails obtained from the National Archives show.

Since assuming office, at least seven times Joe Biden or his communications team have outright denied, and deflected questions about, involvement in the Biden family enterprise.
Biden ‚Äúacted at all times in a manner consistent with well-established executive branch ethics standards,‚Äù Andrew Bates, a spokesman for the president‚Äôs campaign, said in 2019. ‚ÄúHe carried out the Obama-Biden administration‚Äôs policies without regard to any interests other than the public‚Äôs and neither discussed this with his son nor was involved in any way with his son‚Äôs private business pursuits.‚Äù

But those denials have been proven false again by a new trove of emails uncovered from the National Archives by America First Legal. The new trove of emails unearthed by a lawsuit against the Archives shows Biden and Hunter coordinated through their respective associates in response to questions from reporters about if Hunter‚Äôs position on Burisma‚Äôs board undermined then-Vice President Biden‚Äôs credibility in pushing anti-corruption measures.

In April 2014, Hunter joined the board of Burisma, just two years before Joe Biden stated he forced the firing of Ukraine prosecutor Viktor Shokin, who was investigating Burisma. Despite Hunter‚Äôs lack of experience in Ukraine or the energy sector, he was paid $83,000 per month by the energy company, or $1 million per year ‚Äî just weeks after his father was announced ‚Äúpoint person‚Äù on U.S. foreign policy toward Ukraine.

Emails previously released from the Archives show Hunter advised the Office of Vice President Biden in 2014 on how to handle media inquiries regarding his position on the board of Burisma, a potential violation of federal law due to Hunter failing to register as a foreign agent.

That trend appears to have continued well into 2015 when Kate Bedingfield, Biden‚Äôs former communications director, told Hunter‚Äôs top financial lieutenant Eric Schwerin via email that Joe Biden approved a statement regarding Hunter‚Äôs board position.

Notably, Bedingfield departed the White House in 2023 just as the House Oversight Committee probe into Joe Biden heated up.

‚ÄúVP signed off on this ‚Äî will give this quote to reporters in my name shortly,‚Äù she said, including the quote below in the email:

‚ÄúHunter Biden is a private citizen and a lawyer. The Vice President does not endorse any particular company and has no involvement with this company. The Vice President has pushed aggressively for years ‚Äî both publicly with groups like the US-Ukraine Business Forum and privately in meetings in with [sic] Ukrainian leaders ‚Äî for Ukraine to make every effort to investigate and prosecute corruption in accordance with the rule of law. It will once again be a key focus during his trip this week.‚Äù

America First Legal President Stephen Miller stated the emails are a bombshell that shows Hunter and Joe Biden often coordinated about the family‚Äôs business dealings. They are ‚Äúexplosive revelations‚Äù that ‚Äúconclusively demonstrate that there is no daylight between Hunter and Joe Biden on Ukraine,‚Äù he said in a statement.

‚ÄúTaken together with the Oversight Committee‚Äôs revelations about the Biden Family finances, it is now indisputable that there is a need for a full criminal investigation into the Bidens‚Äô foreign influence peddling and exotic foreign financial payoffs,‚Äù Miller said.
On Thursday, the House Oversight Committee revealed a Biden family business associate received a $3 million wire transfer from a Chinese energy company and subsequent payments after Joe Biden left the vice presidency in 2017. In turn, the family business associate sent $1.3 million to Hunter, James, Hallie, and an unknown ‚ÄúBiden.‚ÄùJoe Biden denied the payout on Friday when questioned about recent revelations the family received funds from China.

Can you say Influence Peddling, Pay to Play Scams, Money Laundering, Tax Evasion etc.

Say it ain't So..........."Quid Pro Joe"

Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive""Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy.""References:* Financial Times - ... It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022).""West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."eric bloodaxe: "Interviewer: 'Mr Johnson, out of all the lies you've ever told, which one is your favourite?' ~ Johnson: 'I've never told any lies.' ~ Interviewer: 'Yes, that's my favourite, too.'" #BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: ‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic..."
"Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."
Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;
‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:
* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ
* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):
* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):
* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):
* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):
* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):
* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):
* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):
* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022)."

"West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."
Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."

H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."

Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."
eric bloodaxe: "Interviewer: 'Mr Johnson, out of all the lies you've ever told, which one is your favourite?' ~ Johnson: 'I've never told any lies.' ~ Interviewer: 'Yes, that's my favourite, too.'"

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: ‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic..."
"Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."
Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;
‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:
* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ
* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):
* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):
* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):
* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):
* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):
* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):
* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):
* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022)."

"West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."
Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."

H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."

Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."
eric bloodaxe: "Interviewer: 'Mr Johnson, out of all the lies you've ever told, which one is your favourite?' ~ Johnson: 'I've never told any lies.' ~ Interviewer: 'Yes, that's my favourite, too.'"

‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:
* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ

* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):

* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):
* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):
* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):
* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):
* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."
Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."

H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."

Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: ‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic..."
"Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."
Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;
‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:

_source.content: #BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: ‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic...""Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive""Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy.""References:* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022).""West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."eric bloodaxe: "Interviewer: 'Mr Johnson, out of all the lies you've ever told, which one is your favourite?' ~ Johnson: 'I've never told any lies.' ~ Interviewer: 'Yes, that's my favourite, too.'" #BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: ‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic..."
"Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."
Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;
‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:
* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ
* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):
* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):
* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):
* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):
* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):
* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):
* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):
* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022)."

"West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."
Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."

H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."

Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."
eric bloodaxe: "Interviewer: 'Mr Johnson, out of all the lies you've ever told, which one is your favourite?' ~ Johnson: 'I've never told any lies.' ~ Interviewer: 'Yes, that's my favourite, too.'"

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: ‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic..."
"Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."
Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;
‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:
* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ
* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):
* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):
* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):
* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):
* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):
* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):
* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):
* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022)."

"West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."
Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."

H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."

Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."
eric bloodaxe: "Interviewer: 'Mr Johnson, out of all the lies you've ever told, which one is your favourite?' ~ Johnson: 'I've never told any lies.' ~ Interviewer: 'Yes, that's my favourite, too.'"

Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*

‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;

‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:
* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ
* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):
* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):
* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):
* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):
* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):
* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):
* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):
* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022)."

"West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."
Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."

H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."

Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."

We are all patriotic Americans here no matter race or creed<-.Our Current Goals: #1 ELECTION INTEGRITY #2  Build a list of Patriot candidates that we as grassroots will overtake the GOP picks.#3  Listen to suggestions for more goals..Constitution party groups on GAB (official webpage links coming soon).
