‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:
* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ
* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):
* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):
* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):
* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):
* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):
* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):
* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):
* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022)."

"West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."
Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."

H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."

Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."
eric bloodaxe: "Interviewer: 'Mr Johnson, out of all the lies you've ever told, which one is your favourite?' ~ Johnson: 'I've never told any lies.' ~ Interviewer: 'Yes, that's my favourite, too.'"

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: ‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic..."
"Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."
Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;
‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:
* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ
* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):
* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):
* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):
* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):
* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):
* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):
* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):
* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022)."

"West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."
Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."

H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."

Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."
eric bloodaxe: "Interviewer: 'Mr Johnson, out of all the lies you've ever told, which one is your favourite?' ~ Johnson: 'I've never told any lies.' ~ Interviewer: 'Yes, that's my favourite, too.'"

_source.content: #BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: ‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic...""Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive""Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy.""References:* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022).""West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."eric bloodaxe: "Interviewer: 'Mr Johnson, out of all the lies you've ever told, which one is your favourite?' ~ Johnson: 'I've never told any lies.' ~ Interviewer: 'Yes, that's my favourite, too.'" #BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: ‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic..."
"Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."
Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;
‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:
* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ
* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):
* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):
* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):
* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):
* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):
* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):
* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):
* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022)."

"West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."
Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."

H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."

Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."
eric bloodaxe: "Interviewer: 'Mr Johnson, out of all the lies you've ever told, which one is your favourite?' ~ Johnson: 'I've never told any lies.' ~ Interviewer: 'Yes, that's my favourite, too.'"

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: ‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic..."
"Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."
Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;
‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:
* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ
* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):
* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):
* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):
* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):
* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):
* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):
* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):
* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022)."

"West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."
Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."

H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."

Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."
eric bloodaxe: "Interviewer: 'Mr Johnson, out of all the lies you've ever told, which one is your favourite?' ~ Johnson: 'I've never told any lies.' ~ Interviewer: 'Yes, that's my favourite, too.'"

Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."
Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;
‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;
‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:
* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ
* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):
* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):
* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):
* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):
* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):
* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):
* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):
* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022)."

"West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."
Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."

H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."

Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."
eric bloodaxe: "Interviewer: 'Mr Johnson, out of all the lies you've ever told, which one is your favourite?' ~ Johnson: 'I've never told any lies.' ~ Interviewer: 'Yes, that's my favourite, too.'"

Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

_source.content: #BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: ‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic...""Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive""Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy.""References:* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022).""West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."eric bloodaxe: "Interviewer: 'Mr Johnson, out of all the lies you've ever told, which one is your favourite?' ~ Johnson: 'I've never told any lies.' ~ Interviewer: 'Yes, that's my favourite, too.'" #BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: ‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic..."
"Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."
Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;
‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:
* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ
* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):
* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):
* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):
* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):
* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):
* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):
* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):
* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022)."

"West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."
Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."

H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."

Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."
eric bloodaxe: "Interviewer: 'Mr Johnson, out of all the lies you've ever told, which one is your favourite?' ~ Johnson: 'I've never told any lies.' ~ Interviewer: 'Yes, that's my favourite, too.'"

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: ‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic..."
"Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."
Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;
‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

BrianBerletic's Newatlas Channel: ‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic..."
"Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."
Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on Russian military operations in Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of Russia, though that would hardly isolate Crimea entirely; *cute*
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the Kharkov/ Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;
‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its attritionstrategy."

"References:
* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ
* FT - Explosives shortage threatens EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):
* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):
* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):
* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):
* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):
* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):
* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):
* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022)."

"West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."
Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."

H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."

Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."
eric bloodaxe: "Interviewer: 'Mr Johnson, out of all the lies you've ever told, which one is your favourite?' ~ Johnson: 'I've never told any lies.' ~ Interviewer: 'Yes, that's my favourite, too.'"

üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic..."
"Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."
Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;
‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:

* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):
* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):
* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):
* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022)."

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:
* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ
* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):
* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):
* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):
* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):
* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):
* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):
* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):
* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022)."

"West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."
Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."

H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."

Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: ‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic..."
"Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."
Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;
‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:
* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ
* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):
* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):
* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):
* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):
* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):
* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):
* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):
* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022)."

"West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."
Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."

H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."

Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: ‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
üá¨üáß "The UKs own BBC article on the UK sending depleted uranium (DU) rounds to Ukraine mentions the UK government's claim that it is harmless, then at the bottom of the article cites the UN which admits DU is highly poisonous and carcinogenic..."
"Dangers of the UKs depleted uranium munitions being sent to Ukraine..."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ "Pro-Ukrainian LIVE UA Map indicates üá∑üá∫ Russian forces pushing further toward Avdeevka's encirclement, as encirclement of Bakhmut continues... Any serious offensive to relieve one or both fortified cities will divert trained manpower and equipment being assembled for üá∫üá¶ Ukraine's upcoming "spring offensive."
Dividing up Ukraine's offensive potential among 2 or more actual operations will diminish the prospects of Ukraine's collective success. Russia has been placing immense pressure on Ukraine, not in terms of seizing territory, but in terms of attrition, chipping away at infrastructure, creating a cumulative impact on Ukraine's overall fighting capacity."

‚öîÔ∏è üá∑üá∫ üá∫üá¶ NEW VIDEO: "West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive"
"Update on #Russian military operations in #Ukraine for March 23, 2023:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian forces continue encircling the fortified cities of Bakhmut & now Avdeevka, two major points along Ukraine's defense line in the Donbass;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine is gearing up for its upcoming offensive, carrying out drone strikes on üá∑üá∫ Crimea & reconnaissance by force along the line of contact in Zaporozhye;
‚ñ™Ô∏è the stated goal of Ukraine according to Western üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàreports is to cut the land-bridge between Crimea & the rest of #Russia, though that would hardly isolate #Crimea entirely; *cute*
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine would suffer immense losses, just as they did during the #Kharkov/ #Kherson offensives last year, with the addition of many more Russian troops & extensive defensive works created months in advance;
‚ñ™Ô∏è The üá∫üá∏ US & üá™üá∫ EU are surging remaining stockpiles of artillery ammunition to üá∫üá¶ Ukraine ahead of the offensive to sustain 2-4 months of intense fighting. Once depleted it will take (many) years for the West to restore these stockpiles;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Russian üá∑üá∫ shell production appears to have exceeded Western output as early as 2014-2015 & has continuously increased since meaning Russia's ability to regenerate combat power exceeds the West's at this moment;
‚ñ™Ô∏è Ukraine's upcoming (desperate) offensive should not be underestimated nor the prospects of a breakthrough, Russian forces have repeatedly demonstrated a preference for withdrawing over being encircled or suffering heavy casualties as part of its #attritionstrategy."

"References:
* Financial Times - ... 'Error403/censored' üòÇ
* FT - Explosives shortage threatens #EU drive to arm Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* Reuters - üá™üá∫ EU seals plan to send a million #artilleryshells to Ukraine (March 20, 23):
* NYT - Artillery Is Breaking in Ukraine. It‚Äôs Becoming a Problem for the üá∫üá∏ Pentagon. (Nov 25, 2022):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Big Gains Bakhmut, üá¨üáß UK MoD Alarmed #Avdeevka; West Stakes All Kiev Offensive; Xi Jinping Moscow (March 21, 23):
* The Telegraph - Putin is 'running out of time' to win the ammunition war against the West (March 9, 23):
* Novya Gazeta - Barren Barrels (Nov 2022):
* Ukrainian Armed Forces - Russia resumed production of 152-mm shells (Nov 2022):
* Jamestown Foundation - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part One) (Dec 2022):
* Jamestown F. - Russia 'Struggles' to Maintain Munition Stocks (Part Two) (Dec 2022):
* The Moscow Times - Russia Says Ramping Up Ammunition Production for Ukraine War (Jan 2023):
* Defense News - Army acquisition chief would welcome tank ramp-up if üá∫üá∏ Congress funds it (May 2022)."

"West Surges Ammunition Ahead of Ukraine's All-Or-Nothing Offensive" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZbfsZ2I2gg (39:01)

Joe j: "As a ex Artilleryman gun driver, loader etc on 105 mm Self Propelled Abbot, in a Regiment of 18 gun platforms up to 30% of guns could be in a state of repair in one form or other & that is in peacetime, great show as always Brian!"

Levan Gudadze: "Russian armed forces hit two hangars with weapons & military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) at the Shkolny airfield near Odessa."

DOT DOT: "I believe NATO would join the counteroffensive in the guise of mercenaries; and would be sending every arsenal they have."
Shannon MacKenzie: "Sounds like the west is going for broke & here's me thinking the west is already broken."

H K: "Ukraine's third army is about to get reked."

Chris Ward: "British military intelligence üòÇüòÇüòÇ I nearly choked on my tea."

group.description: A group of MAGA patriots, largely former Treepers from CTH, who are followers of QAnon, and diehard supporters of President Donald Trump.  We support free speech, freedom of religion, the Constitution, and the principles handed down to us by the Founders.  We actively oppose all forms of censorship, and research all theories with open minds.  Our new site, theqtree.com, is where we hang out.  This Gab group is for when we need to "meet by the old mill".
